## utils.noEvent() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> 

Halts the propagation of the event without doing anything else.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function noEvent(e: Event): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | An event. |
